full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/15/2023 BREACH CANDY HOSPITAL AND RESEARCH CENTRE 60-A, BHULABHAI DESAI ROAD * BOMBAY - 400 026. * PHONE : 36336 51 (6 LINES) RADIOLOGIST Dr. M. TAYABALI M.B., Ch. B. (SCOT.) D.M.R.D. (LOND.) 23rd February 1993. MISTRY MANCHHABEN CHHABILDAS. M 096107. P.A. VIEW OF THE CHEST: There is scoliosis of the dorsal spine with its convexity to the right. There is evidence of fibrotic bands seen in the left infra-clavicular region. No other abnormality is detected in the chest. CONCLUSION: Scoliosis of dorsal spine. Fibrotic bands left infra-clavicular region most likely as a result of Koch's ?activity. the DR. Anirudh Kohli, M.D., D.N.B., D.M.R.D. jl;
